job_tasks.justification: This title indicates a focus on building and integrating various components of a software application, which is a core software engineering task.

This phrase describes the nature of the application being built, implying that AI/ML capabilities will be integrated into the product. The role of a Full Stack Developer in this context is to build the application that utilizes these AI features.

profile.rationale: The job title "Full Stack Developer" indicates a primary focus on software engineering tasks (Macro-Category A). The mention of "AI Fact Checker" signifies that the developed software will incorporate AI/ML capabilities, making it an AI-powered system. This fits the AI-Adjacent Software Engineer profile, which emphasizes building software that uses AI, rather than developing the AI models themselves.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is extremely short and only provides a title. It lacks any details about specific tasks, technologies, or required skills, making a thorough analysis impossible. The profile assignment is based purely on inference from the title.
